name: Kotlin
description: Modern statically-typed JVM programming language optimized for safety concision and interoperability with Java - Docs

name: Recycli
description: Kotlin Android library that simplifies building RecyclerViews with multiple view types using DiffUtil and code generation and MVI architecture - Docs

name: RxKotlin
description: Extension for Kotlin that adds reactive and functional programming capabilities through Observable sequences - Docs

name: Kotlin Coroutines
description: Lightweight concurrency design pattern in Kotlin that simplifies async code by avoiding callback hell - Docs

name: Gson
description: Java library for serializing and deserializing JSON from and to Java objects with no annotations required - Docs

name: Retrofit
description: Type-safe REST client for Android and Java that handles API interactions using annotations and conventions - Docs

name: Hilt
description: Dependency injection library for Android built on Dagger that simplifies injection boilerplate code - Docs

name: Jetpack Navigation
description: Android Jetpack library that simplifies implementing navigation between screens using XML graph definitions - Docs

name: Flow
description: Reactive streams API in Kotlin for asynchronously processing streams of data sequentially and safely - Docs

name: LiveData
description: Android Jetpack lifecycle-aware observable data holder class designed to be used with UI components - Docs

name: Room
description: Android Jetpack SQLite object mapping library providing an abstraction layer over SQLite database - Docs

name: Picasso
description: Popular Android image loading library for asynchronously downloading and caching and displaying images - Docs

name: Jetpack Architecture Components
description: Collection of libraries from Android Jetpack like LiveData and Navigation that help design robust testable apps - Docs

name: Lint
description: Android Studio static code analysis tool that helps surface bugs and quality issues in code - Docs

name: Gradle
description: Open source build automation tool focused on flexibility and performance used for building Android apps - Docs

name: Gitlab
description: Web-based DevOps lifecycle platform offering version control and CI/CD pipelines and monitoring and more - Docs

name: Firebase
description: Google's mobile backend-as-a-service offering realtime database and authentication and crash reporting and more - Docs

name: Android studio
description: Official integrated development environment (IDE) for Android development providing emulators and SDK tools etc - Docs

name: Jira
description: Proprietary project management tracking tool from Atlassian used for agile development and issue tracking - Docs

name: Jetpack Compose
description: Modern Android UI toolkit for building native UIs with a declarative Kotlin DSL instead of XML layouts - Docs

name: Feature Flags
description: Software development technique to turn features on/off at runtime enabling controlled rollouts and testing - Docs

name: SnowPlow
description: Open source data pipeline for collecting and processing and operationalizing high volume behavioral data - Docs

name: Confluence
description: Team collaboration software from Atlassian for creating technical documentation and knowledge management - Docs

name: Kaspresso
description: Lightweight Kotlin Android UI testing library on top of Espresso providing concise and readable tests - Docs

name: Wiremock
description: Library for stubbing and mocking web services during testing allowing simulation of various behaviors - Docs

name: UI tests
description: Testing approach that focuses on simulating user interface interactions to validate functionality and UX - Docs

name: JUnit4
description: Veteran Java unit testing framework providing annotations and classes to organize test code - Docs

name: Ktor
description: Kotlin framework for building connected applications supporting client-server and async TCP and websocket use cases - Docs

name: Yandex Maps
description: Maps and location services platform from Yandex with APIs for web and mobile apps - Docs

name: Google ML-kit
